main.name: Luis Fuentes
main.description: I'm Dallas, Texas based Software Engineer with extensive education in Web Developement. Let's start scrolling and learn more about me
main.bio: My name is Luis Fuentes, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer graduated from Kenzie Academy. Currently I'm looking for a job into Software Engineering to get professinoal experience and develop amazing projects.

education.description: Graduated with Front-End and Full-Stack Web Development certifications.

education.program: Technical Systems and Security Certification Program
education.description: Obtained CompTIA certifications such as A+, Server+, Network+, and Security+. And also got MTA Fundamentals certificationes and Linux Essentials.

work.description: Staffing support helping out campus technicians to assist them installing Chromebooks in Rockwall, TX high schools.
Consulting inventory reports, unpacking merchandise, arranging items on shelves, updating activity records, taking safety precautions, collaborating with watchmen, and reporting to managers.
